name: Mary Ann PROTZ v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DERRY AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT). Petition of Derry Area School District
name_abbreviation: Protz v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board (Derry Area School District)

parties: Mary Ann PROTZ v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DERRY AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT). Petition of Derry Area School District.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of March, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Does Section 306(a.2) of the Pennsylvania Workers’ Compensation Act unconstitutionally delegate the State Legislature’s lawmaking authority in violation of Article II, Section 1 of the Pennsylvania Constitution by incorporating the most recent edition of the AMA Guides to the Evaluation of Permanent Impairment ?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
133 A.3d 733
Mary Ann PROTZ v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (DERRY AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT). Petition of Derry Area School District.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 22, 2016.
